detail_desc: Cardigan in soft, fluffy faux fur with long sleeves and no fasteners. Jersey lining.
Shorts in stretch twill with a zip fly, front and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Joggers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
T-shirt in soft jersey.
Shorts in a soft cotton weave with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Pyjamas in soft cotton. Top in soft jersey with short sleeves. Shorts in woven fabric with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist.
Knee-length shorts in a patterned cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and an open back pocket.
Ankle boots with pointed toes, a zip in one side and covered heels. Fabric linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel approx. 5.5 cm.
Relaxed-fit top in sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed turtle neck, dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.

prod_name: Frances LT non wire push body
detail_desc: Microfibre and lace body with a gentle sculpting effect on the waist and bum. Padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and laser-cut hems for a smooth silhouette. Lined gusset with a press-stud fastening.
Pointelle-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.

Short dress in heavily draping jersey with gathers at the shoulders and a gently draped front. Slightly dropped shoulders, long tapered sleeves, and an elasticated seam with a flounce at the waist. Lined.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a single button at the front and buttons at the cuffs. Flap front pockets, an inner pocket and a single back vent. Satin lining.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short, off-the-shoulder dress in woven fabric with broderie anglaise. Elasticated top, 3/4-length sleeves with flounced cuffs and an elasticated seam at the waist. Lined.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in crinkled jersey with short puff sleeves and elastication with a small frill trim around the top, sleeves and hem.
Fitted jersey crêpe top in a narrow cut at the top with ties at the back of the neck. Lined.
Knee-length shorts in washed cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.

Blouse in a crinkled weave with a sheen. Decorative gathers at the neckline, long sleeves with covered buttons at the cuffs and an opening down the back with wide ties at the hem. Unlined. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled.
Jacket in imitation leather with quilted sections and a small stand-up collar with a tab and press-stud. Zip down the front, zipped side pockets and an inner pocket. Lined.
Leather sandals with an adjustable ankle strap that has a hook and loop fastening. Leather and rubber insoles and smooth rubber soles.
Knee-length lace dress with a small stand-up collar, long sleeves, concealed zip at the back, seam at the waist and flared, asymmetric skirt. Lined.
V-neck T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Sleeveless microfibre nightslip with triangular, lace-trimmed cups and adjustable shoulder straps.
Fitted top in organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and a V-neck with a lace trim.
Fully lined, patterned bikini. Top with a wide flounce front and back and narrow shoulder straps, one with a small, sewn-on metal pendant. Bottoms with decorative ties at the sides.
Short dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a round neckline. concealed zip at the back and 3/4-length sleeves. Seam at the waist with pleats, and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Top in an airy knit made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend containing some wool. Round neckline and slightly longer sleeves.
Wide top in scuba fabric with beaded embroidery on the front, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sandals with narrow straps. Adjustable ankle strap with concealed elastication and a metal buckle.
Push-up bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Pyjamas in soft velour. Long-sleeved top with an appliqué on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Short, cold shoulder wrap dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and concealed press-stud at the top, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, short flounced sleeves and ties at the side. Flounce at the top that continues around the back, down the front and around the hem. Unlined.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, reflective details and soft fleece inside. Detachable hood with a soft fleece lining, a stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Front pockets and elastication at the cuffs. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Set with a dress and leggings in soft organic cotton jersey. Dress with press-studs on the shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and patch pockets with a print motif on the front. Patterned leggings with a wide, foldover waist.

Short dress woven in a cotton blend with a V-neck, buttons down the front, rounded shoulders and short sleeves. Seam at the waist that is partially elasticated with gathers at the front and a box pleat at the back. Pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Ankle boots with lacing at the front and fabric linings and insoles. Platform front 2.5 cm, heel 10 cm.
Pyjamas in a patterned viscose weave. Top with a gentle V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Short shorts with an elasticated waist.
Dungaree shorts in washed stretch twill with adjustable straps, a chest pocket, side pockets and back pockets. Buttons at the sides, a fake fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot and a decorative bow at the front. Satin linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist and side pockets. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and straight legs with good room for movement over the thighs and knees.
Double-layered tube scarf in soft cotton jersey.
Polo-neck jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
High-waisted shorts in jacquard-weave viscose with a sheen, side pockets and a zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Slightly lower crotch and elastication at the back of the waist.
Sleeveless top in a viscose weave with a V-neck, adjustable spaghetti straps and embroidery at the top. Lined at the front.
Long linen shirt with a collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Dungarees in a striped organic cotton weave with a button at the sides and straps with adjustable buttoning at the front. One back pocket and long legs.
Leather sandals with a perforated pattern and a hook and loop tab on one side. Imitation leather linings and insoles and soft imitation suede soles.
Padded gilet with a detachable, lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and welt side pockets. Lined.
Baby Exclusive. Jumper in a soft, textured organic cotton knit with buttons at the back and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Nightdresses in soft, printed cotton jersey with butterfly sleeves and a small bow at the neckline.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a text print motif, jersey-lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shorter top in sweatshirt fabric with a stand-up collar, zip at the top, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Jacket in cotton corduroy with notch lapels, buttons at the front, a chest pocket with a decorative handkerchief and fake front pockets´with a flap. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Joggers in printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a ribbed, elasticated, drawstring waist. Side pockets, an open back pocket, and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Joggers in lightweight jersey made from a cotton blend with a ribbed, elasticated waistband, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems. The cotton content of the joggers is organic.
Long cardigan in a soft, fine loose knit with slits at the hem and no fasteners. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.

Calf-length dress in satin with inset elasticated trims around the collar, shoulders, waist and sleeves for a gathered effect. Stand up collar with buttons at the back of the neck and long, wide sleeves that taper to the cuffs. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Satin-lined bodice and skirt.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.

Dress in patterned, lightly crinkled chiffon with a small, frill-trimmed stand-up collar, smocked yoke and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Smocked seam at the waist and long sleeves with smocking at the top and wide smocking at the cuffs. Partly lined.
Flock-print tights with an elasticated waist.
Padded sleep bag in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and zip at one side. Jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only.
Round imitation leather purse with a zip fastening and cotton twill lining. Size 3x9 cm.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Gloves in soft, supple leather. Lined.
Baby Exclusive. Trousers in organic cotton with an elasticated waist, decorative buttons at the front and side pockets.
Baby Exclusive. Trousers in a double-layered, textured organic cotton weave with adjustable braces that cross at the back and button at the front. Elasticated waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short dress in woven fabric in a narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps. Lace section with buttons at the back, an elasticated seam at the waist and a flounced hem. Jersey lining.
Short jersey skirt with concealed elastication at the waist.
Long dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, wrapover front, wide tie at the waist and short, double-layered sleeves. Unlined.
Trainers in imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and lacing at the front. Mesh linings, fabric insoles and patterned soles.
Sweatpants with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Set with a hat and scarf in a soft, fine knit.
Thin metal rings in various designs. Three decorated with small, sparkly glass beads.
5-pocket, low-rise, skinny-fit jeans in stretch denim with a zip fly and super-skinny legs.
